## How to Use This Template

1. Copy this template to `docs/architecture/adr-NNNN-short-title.md`
2. Replace NNNN with the next sequential number (e.g., 0001, 0002)
3. Fill in all sections, removing placeholder text
4. Create PR with label `architecture`
5. After approval, update Status to "Accepted"

See existing ADRs in `docs/architecture/` for examples.
